title: I Can’t Stop Thinking About Lenovo’s Brilliant Modular Mouse Concept at CES 2025 - Yanko Design
excerpt: You go to a tech expo like CES expecting to be absolutely wowed by phones, laptops, GPUs, cars, and all sorts of prominent product categories. title: The Infinite Memo
